com.dragonboatrace.game.screens

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.dragonboatrace.game.screens.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    The main game screen which is showing when the player is actually playing the game.
    Author:
    Jacob Turner

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The array of available backgrounds to display.

      The difficulty of the race chosen by the player.

      The y-position of the finish line, ie the length of the race.

      The finish line of that round.

      The array of lane markers that separates each lane.

      The array of the lanes that are in the game.

      The instance of the player boat.
      (package private) long raceStartTime
      The time at which the race started.
      (package private) int round

                  int round,
                  Lane[] lanes,
                  PlayerBoat playerBoat,
                  int difficulty)
        Creates a new screen.
        Parameters:
        game - The instance of DragonBoatRace.
        round - The current round of the game.
        lanes - The array of lanes to be persistent throughout the whole game.
        playerBoat - The instance of the player boat.
        difficulty - The difficulty chosen by the player.

        jsonString - The json string of the game state from a save file.
